title: Stability of organic solar cells: toward commercial applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2350-2387
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00492A, Review Article
Pengfei Ding, Daobin Yang, Shuncheng Yang, Ziyi Ge
In this review, we carefully review important strategies to improve the stability of OSCs in the past three years from the perspectives of material design and device engineering.
